name: The Room - VR (Oculus Rift)
description:
The game was made for a code-jam organized by 10Pearls.

It's an object finding game (3D) set in cyberpunk world where you have to find given objects with in limited time to win. The supported hardware is Oculus Rift with it's motion controller.

All of the assets are from Unreal Engine Demos (Sci-fi Bunk, Sci-fi Hallway).
